statements: DELETE FROM risk_metrics WHERE timestamp < NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY;
DELETE FROM risk_metrics WHERE risk_type = 'Credit' AND risk_value > 0.5;
DELETE FROM risk_metrics WHERE metric_name = 'Value at Risk';
DELETE FROM risk_metrics WHERE id = 1 AND metric_value > 100
DELETE FROM trading_operations WHERE trade_type = 'Buy' AND trade_amount < 500 AND risk_score > 7
DELETE FROM risk_metrics WHERE metric_name LIKE '%Volatility%'
DELETE FROM trading_operations WHERE operation_type = 'SELL' AND operation_amount > 10000;
DELETE FROM exposure_assessment WHERE assessment_rating = 'High' AND assessed_by = 'Jon Doe';
DELETE FROM TradeExposure WHERE trade_id = 100 AND currency = 'USD';
DELETE FROM ExposureMetrics WHERE metric_id IN (SELECT metric_id FROM RiskMetrics WHERE metric_value < 0);
